title: Entering into a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) between the Industrial Technology Institute of Sri Lanka and the International Center for Chemical and Biological Sciences (ICCBS) of Pakistan
decision_details: - A proposal has been made to enter into a Memorandum of Understanding between the Industrial Technology Institute of Sri Lanka and the International Center for Chemical and Biological Sciences (ICCBS) of Pakistan, with the objective of securing cooperation between Sri Lanka and Pakistan in the fields of chemical and Biological Sciences. Accordingly, the proposal made by Hon. Susil Premajayantha, the Minister of Science, Technology and Research, to sign the proposed  Memorandum of Understanding during the scheduled state visit of H.E the President to Pakistan, was approved by the Cabinet.
